alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:19PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of western Tooele County through 600 PM MDT... At 518 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Utah Test and Training Range South to 9 miles southwest of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Utah Test and Training Range South, Knolls, Ibapah, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 1 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
